mapper.select: SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'avinext' AND TABLE_NAME = 'TB_RCEPT'
SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(PDL_NO),6)+1 FROM TB_RCEPT WHERE PDL_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{pdlNo},'%')

SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE HOSP_NO = CASE WHEN (SELECT HOSP_NO FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = '' THEN (SELECT HOSP_NO FROM TB_HOSPITAL ORDER BY HOSP_NO LIMIT 1) ELSE (SELECT HOSP_NO FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) END
SELECT * FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID LIKE 'C001%' AND CODE_LEVEL = '4'
SELECT * FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID LIKE 'MH001%' AND CODE_LEVEL = '3'

SELECT A.* , CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CODE_NM,' > '),(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = A.UPP_CODE_ID)),' > '),(SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE T WHERE T.CODE_ID = (SELECT UPP_CODE_ID FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = A.UPP_CODE_ID))) CODE_NM_GROUP FROM TB_CODE A WHERE CODE_ID LIKE 'B001%' AND CODE_LEVEL = '4'

SELECT RQST_NO, HOSP_NO, HOSP_NM, USER_NO , USER_NM, ANIM_NO, ANIM_NM, FARM_NO , FARM_NM, DOC_NO, DOC_NM, ANIM_BUTLER , BUTLER_SIDO, BUTLER_SIGUNGU, BUTLER_SIGUNGU_CD , ANIM_BIRTH, ANIM_FIRST_CD, ANIM_SECOND_CD, ANIM_THIRD_CD , ANIM_SEX, RQST_DT, PROC_STAT , CASE WHEN PROC_STAT = '5' THEN '검사완료' WHEN PROC_STAT = '1' THEN '신청중' WHEN PROC_STAT = '2' THEN '신청중' WHEN PROC_STAT = '3' THEN '접수' ELSE '검사중' END AS PROC_STAT_NM , RQST_MEMO, PAY_GB, PRICE, PAY_STAT , PAYED_DT, RESULT, RESULT_WRITER, FINISH_DT , DIAG_UP_CD, DIAG_CD , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.RESULT_WRITER) AS RESULT_WRITER_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.DIAG_CD) AS DIAG_CD_NM , CONVERT(FINAL_MEMO USING UTF8) AS FINAL_MEMO , PDL_NO FROM TB_RCEPT A WHERE INS_ID = #{insId}
AND PROC_STAT != '5'
AND PROC_STAT = '5'
ORDER BY INS_DT DESC

SELECT A.* , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_FIRST_CD) AS INSP_FIRST_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_SECOND_CD) AS INSP_SECOND_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_THIRD_CD) AS INSP_THIRD_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_TYPE) AS INSP_TYPE_NM FROM TB_INSPECTION A WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
SELECT A.* , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.SAMPLE_CODE) AS SAMPLE_NAME FROM TB_SAMPLE A WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS SUM_CNT , SUM(INSP_PRICE) AS INSP_PRICE , (SELECT MAX(PAY_STAT) FROM TB_RCEPT B WHERE RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND PDL_NO = #{rqstNo}) AS PAY_STAT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE RQST_NO = (SELECT RQST_NO FROM TB_RCEPT WHERE PDL_NO = #{rqstNo})

SELECT A.* , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_FIRST_CD) AS INSP_FIRST_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_SECOND_CD) AS INSP_SECOND_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE B WHERE B.CODE_ID = A.INSP_THIRD_CD) AS INSP_THIRD_NM FROM TB_INSPECTION A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo}
SELECT A.* , (SELECT INSP_RESULT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE INSP_NO = A.INSP_NO) INSP_RESULT FROM TB_ANTIBIOTIC A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} ORDER BY CAST(ANTI_NO AS UNSIGNED)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SERUM ( INSP_NO , SER_NAME , SER_DATA , INS_DT , INS_ID ) VALUES ( #{inspNo} , #{serName} , #{serData} , NOW() , #{insId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SER_DATA = #{serData} , UPT_DT = NOW() , UPT_ID = #{insId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , (SELECT INSP_RESULT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE INSP_NO = A.INSP_NO) INSP_RESULT FROM TB_SERUM A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} ORDER BY SER_NAME
SELECT SER_DATA , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_SERUM WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} GROUP BY SER_DATA
SELECT A.* , (SELECT INSP_RESULT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE INSP_NO = A.INSP_NO) INSP_RESULT FROM TB_PCR A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} ORDER BY SMPL_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOOD_CHEM ( INSP_NO , ITEM_NAME , VAL , INS_DT , INS_ID ) VALUES ( #{inspNo} , #{itemName} , #{val} , NOW() , #{insId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE VAL = #{val} , UPT_DT = NOW() , UPT_ID = #{insId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , (SELECT INSP_RESULT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE INSP_NO = A.INSP_NO) INSP_RESULT FROM TB_BLOOD_CHEM A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} ORDER BY INS_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CBC ( INSP_NO , ITEM_NAME , VAL , INS_DT , INS_ID ) VALUES ( #{inspNo} , #{itemName} , #{val} , NOW() , #{insId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE VAL = #{val} , UPT_DT = NOW() , UPT_ID = #{insId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , (SELECT INSP_RESULT FROM TB_INSPECTION WHERE INSP_NO = A.INSP_NO) INSP_RESULT FROM TB_CBC A WHERE INSP_NO = #{inspNo} ORDER BY INS_DT
SELECT CONCAT('XYZ',CAST(MAX(SUBSTR(ANIM_NO,4)) AS SIGNED)+1) FROM TB_ANIMAL WHERE ANIM_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{animNo},'%')
